entries.abort: Abort command received. Return to base.
entries.arrival_phase_1: The mine freighter is set to arrive shortly.
entries.arrival_phase_2: The mine freighter has arrived. Eliminate the escort and disable that ship.
entries.capture_complete: pcontrast1 Tactical Computer:pcontrast3 <Freighter captured. Prepare to escort it out of this sector.>
entries.capture_phase_2: Bridge captured. We will have her back up and running briefly.
entries.capture_phase_2_1: Bridge captured. We will have her back up and running briefly.
entries.capture_phase_2_2: Bridge captured. We will have her back up and running briefly.
entries.capture_phase_2_3: Bridge captured. We will have her back up and running briefly.
entries.capture_phase_2_4: Bridge captured. We will have her back up and running briefly.
entries.capture_phase_2_5: Bridge captured. We will have her back up and running briefly.
entries.complete: Nice work, pilot. The captured mining vessel is in Imperial hands. Report back to your superior or wait for another target vessel.
entries.complete_1: Nice work, pilot. The captured mining vessel is in Imperial hands. Report back to your superior or wait for another target vessel.
entries.complete_2: Nice work, pilot. The captured mining vessel is in Imperial hands. Report back to your superior or wait for another target vessel.
entries.complete_3: Nice work, pilot. The captured mining vessel is in Imperial hands. Report back to your superior or wait for another target vessel.
entries.complete_4: Nice work, pilot. The captured mining vessel is in Imperial hands. Report back to your superior or wait for another target vessel.
entries.complete_5: Nice work, pilot. The captured mining vessel is in Imperial hands. Report back to your superior or wait for another target vessel.
entries.escort_remaining: pcontrast1 Tactical Computer:pcontrast3 <%DI enemy escorts remaining.>
entries.escort_wiped_out: pcontrast1 Tactical Computer:pcontrast3 <Enemy escorts have been eliminated.>
entries.failed_destroy: We lost the freighter with all hands aboard. Failure is not tolerated in the Imperial Inquisition. Return to your superior immediately.
entries.failed_escape: The freighter jumped out of the system. You lost her pilot. Report to your superior at once.
entries.panic_1: I hope they are on their way to rescue us.
entries.panic_3: You should flee while you have the chance.
entries.panic_4: They aren't going to let you have me.
entries.panic_5: Prepare to become space dust, Imperial dog.
entries.quest_disable_d: Once you have caught up to the freighter you will need to disable the vessel. In order to disable a ship, target it, then use the ']' key to cycle through that ship's systems. Target its engines and shoot the vessel. Once the ships engines reach 0% the ship will be disabled.
entries.quest_escort_d: The Rebels will not like losing their prize to the Empire and will probably try to take it back. Follow the freighter until it reaches its destination, protecting it from all attackers.
entries.quest_location_d: The mining guild is operating in Naboo space and is supplying the Rebels with supplies. You will receive a navigation waypoint to the target craft once you enter Naboo space. This waypoint will update as the vessel moves through the zone.
entries.quest_recover_d: Now that the ship is disabled move in close to begin the capture process. You will need to remain close and stationary in order to capture the vessel. It may take a few moments for the capture process to begin so remain in your current location until it is finished.
entries.recovery_success: The freighter is secure. Nice work out there, pilot.
entries.taunt_2: If we can't have it, no one will.
entries.taunt_5: I didn't know that the Empire let you guys off your leashes.
entries.thanks_1: You are better then you look.
entries.thanks_2: There will be more, you can count on it.
entries.thanks_3: That was nice flying but you will have to do better then that to survive.
entries.thanks_5: Bleh! The next wave will get you.
entries.title: Naboo System: Capture the Ironfleck Marauder (Miner Transport) Duty
entries.title_d: Intelligence has reported that the miners of Naboo are supplying Rebel ships with goods. Your assignment is to capture these supply vessels going to the Rebels and returning them to Imperial hands.
